T02D3620:241b-1: dh'a ra d'a na dzam bha lo pa de sha / bod skad du /
T02D3620:241b-2: dzam bha la la chu dbul ba'i man ngag / dpal ldan dzam bha la la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3620:241b-3: ming med kyi rtse mo la dzam yig ser po bsams la /
T02D3620:241b-4: phyag rgya la sogs pas snong la dzam bha la bsgoms nas /
T02D3620:241b-5: ming med kyi rtsa ba la chu rgyun lag pa'i bar du lhung bas /
T02D3620:241b-6: de'i dbu la de bzhin du 'bab cing dzam yig brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3620:241b-7: dzam bha la la chu dbul ba'i man ngag go //
T02D3620:242a-0: lag pa g-yas pa la brum dang po'i lnga pa'i sa @242a * //
T02D3620:242a-1: bon yongs su gyur pa las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsams nas /
T02D3620:242a-2: de la yang zla ba dang lhan cig khu bar byas te /
T02D3620:242a-3: mdun du dzam las byung ba'i dzam bha la rab tu grags pa bskyed nas /
T02D3620:242a-4: sngon du gsungs pa'i khu bas de'i spyi bor chu
T02D3620:242a-5: dang lhan cig brgya rtsa brgyad mdzu ba mo brkyang
T02D3620:242a-6: ba'i bar du'o // khu tshur phyed bcings pa'i lag
T02D3620:242a-7: pas chu khyor ba nas ltung bsam lus pa'i phun
T02D3620:242a-9: dzam bha la'i man ngag go //
T02D3620:242a-10: rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad zhes grags rin chen 'byung ldan dang //
T02D3620:242a-11: de bzhin 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa mi bskyod grags //
T02D3620:242a-12: 'di rnams sku mdog dkar ser dmar dang ljang gu sngon po rnams //
T02D3620:242a-13: byang chub mchog dang mchog sbyin bsam gtan mi 'jigs
T02D3620:242a-14: sa ngon phyag / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
T02D3620:242a-15: sa bon ni // bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um zhes so //
T02D3620:242a-16: zla ba lag pa g-yas gnas pa'i //
T02D3620:242a-17: yi ge lnga las byung ba yi //
T02D3620:242a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsams nas //
T02D3620:242a-19: khu ba'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom //
T02D3620:242a-20: dzam las byung ba'i dzam bha la //
T02D3620:242a-21: bsams nas chu khyor gus pas dbul //
T02D3620:242a-22: de yi sngags ni bzlas pa yi //
T02D3620:242a-23: brgya rtsa brgyad ni dbul bar bya //
